name: Format\TableRowSelector
description: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a row.

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description: Specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All rows for this data descriptor will be selected. See DataDescriptor.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: Specifies a row index. The topmost row of data has an index of 0. The specified column will be selected.

properties.name: odd
properties.description: When true, selects the odd rows.

properties.name: even
properties.description: When true, selects the even rows.
